description: [English version] Updated on October 10, 2021, with a comprehensive display of K8S resources! It includes an overview of K8S overall resources, microservice resource details, Pod resource details, and K8S network bandwidth to optimize the display of important indicators. https://github.com/starsliao/Prometheus
